title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: An open-world action-adventure game that became one of the best-selling titles in history, known for its narrative depth and expansive online mode.
content:
Set in the fictional state of San Andreas, which is based on Southern California, Grand Theft Auto V tells the interwoven stories of three protagonists: Michael De Santa, a retired bank robber living under witness protection; Franklin Clinton, a young repo man seeking a way out of gang life; and Trevor Philips, a violent and unpredictable career criminal. The game's narrative structure allows players to switch between the three characters at almost any time, offering unique perspectives on missions and events.

GTA V is praised for its detailed open world, which includes the city of Los Santos and surrounding countryside, all brimming with dynamic NPCs, side activities, and immersive systems. The story explores themes of crime, corruption, and the pursuit of the American Dream. Beyond the single-player mode, the game includes Grand Theft Auto Online, a constantly evolving multiplayer world where players can engage in missions, build criminal empires, and participate in large-scale events. Its technical achievements, cultural commentary, and longevity have made it a landmark in modern gaming.
